channel.title: Help needed!

item.title: Help needed!
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

Hey when i kill the npc : 491: it says i 've finished the quest + in the quest bar it shows as green than but when i re-log the q1 = 15; isnt saved still Delta base. My code:

[code]
PlayerHandler.portal3 = true;
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 3780) {
PlayerHandler.portal4 = true;
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 491) {
temp.resetPos();
temp.showInterface(297);
temp.sendQuest(“You have completed Ghost’s Scare!”, 301);
temp.q3 = 15;
temp.sendQuest("@gre@Ghost’s Scare", 7332);
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1914 && temp.absX >= 3552 && temp.absX <= 3590 && temp.absY >= 3391 && temp.absY <=3430) {
temp.toX = 2872;
temp.toY = 3756;
}

						if (npcs[i].npcType == 1913 && temp.absX >= 2846 && temp.absX <= 2880 && temp.absY >= 3746 && temp.absY <=3780) {

temp.toX = 3244;
temp.toY = 9365;
}

						if (npcs[i].npcType == 1977 && temp.absX >= 3220 && temp.absX <= 3270 && temp.absY >= 9320 && temp.absY <=9400) {

temp.toX = 2034;
temp.toY = 4526;
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1975 && temp.absX >= 2027 && temp.absX <= 2050 && temp.absY >= 4515 && temp.absY <=4542 && temp.q3 != 15) {
temp.resetPos();
temp.showInterface(297);
temp.sendQuest(“You have completed Desert Treasure!”, 301);
temp.q3 = 15;
temp.sendQuest("@gre@Desert Treasure", 7334);
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 757 && temp.absX >= 3073 && temp.absX <= 3084 && temp.absY >= 9766 && temp.absY <=9780) {
temp.showInterface(297);
temp.sendQuest(“You have completed Vampire Slayer!”, 301);
temp.q4 = 15;
temp.sendQuest("@gre@Vampire Slayer", 7336);[/code]

:’)
